attributes.action: Ban the National Staff Dismissal Register (NSDR).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The National Staff Dismissal Register (NSDR) is a clear threat to the rights and civil liberties of the employee as it is a register of "accusations" and not actual proven incidents. Such a register of unproven accusations could seriously damage the individuals future employment prospects with potentially little recourse for appeal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
